feed.title: Patch to UNIX makefile to remove -DFOURWAYSSE2

entry.title: Patch to UNIX makefile to remove -DFOURWAYSSE2
entry.summary: The given context is a patch message, where Venkatesh Srinivas suggests removing an obsolete flag from the UNIX makefile. The flag in question is -DFOURWAYSSE2 and is suggested to be removed as it is no longer required. The patch message includes the changes made to the makefile.unix file, where the DEFS variable is updated to remove the aforementioned flag and replace it with -DUSE_SSL. Additionally, the USE_UPNP variable is set to 0 and the LIBS variable is defined. The patch message does not include any further information or details about the changes made.
